channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15381] don't log the callstack for reduce.xml-doesn't-exist
item.description:
Pointless exception in the logs:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: File file:[snip]/itests/qtest/target/tmp/localscratchdir/bcc7fce3-b9a3-4d5a-bf52-4e3b70ad9fed/hive_2016-12-07_09-53-18_167_8716888773328063866-1/-mr-10002/3fb6d7bd-d8b6-4238-bc08-90b2f0217197/reduce.xml does not exist

This is not even an error, so it should be logged at info or warn with no stack
item.summary: don't log the callstack for reduce.xml-doesn't-exist

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: ashutoshc can you take a look? one-line patch
